features: Precision Cleaning: Achieve impeccable hygiene with our 10-hole angled nozzle, ensuring thorough cleansing for postpartum comfort. The nozzle design is crafted for precision, addressing postpartum kit needs for women after birth.
Portable Travel Bidet: Experience convenience on the go with our detachable nozzle peri bottle. The portable design and included travel pouch makes it easy to take your handheld bidet anywhere.

Ample Hydration Capacity: Enhance your post partum care with our peri bottle's increased water capacity. This feature guarantees you have an abundant water supply for each use, promoting optimal cleansing during the healing process.

Effortless Squeeze Design: Simplify your postpartum routine with our easy-to-squeeze post birth wash bottle. The 10-hole design ensures a gentle and controlled stream of water, making hand held bidet use hassle-free.

Stylish Self-Care: Elevate your postpartum recovery journey with our peri bottle's colors. This stylish touch adds a personal flair to your portable bidet sprayer, transforming an essential product into a delightful experience.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Ultimate Childbirth Comfort Companion Embark on a journey of unparalleled postpartum comfort with our convenient peri bottle, designed to revolutionize your healing experience after childbirth. Our peri bottle features an ergonomic design that fits comfortably in your hand, allowing for easy, one-handed operation. The thoughtfully contoured shape ensures a secure grip, facilitating precision and control. Plus, the detachable angled nozzle makes it super comfortable to use and easy to carry on-the-go! Crafted with care and innovation, this indispensable tool is more than just a bottle – it's your ally in reclaiming comfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good price and quality
reviews.reviewText: It’s good and has good water pressure. Easy to use and I use it for when I’m on my period. Helps clean up and is a great portable bidet

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So easy to use!
reviews.reviewText: Light, easy to use, easy to clean. Wonderful product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as advertised!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my daughter and granddaughter, but they prefer a larger bottle. However, I have been using this one myself and find it works very well, especially to clean after #2.The design is just right to reach the areas needed. It really cuts the amount of tp needed, and leaves me assured of cleanliness. I do add two drops or so of body wash, not enough to need a rinse. I don’t carry it with me generally, but if I was traveling and could fit it in my bag, I would.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Portable Bidet!
reviews.reviewText: After reading all the reviews, I decided to order this product and I am glad I did. I have been using the Tushy Portable Bidet because it's very compact and easy to use. However, I like the Cynpel Peri Bottle more. The stream is stronger and the bottle holds more water. Although the bottle does not collapse to a compact size as the Tushy bottle, the spout can collapse into the bottle making it more compact and easier to pack when traveling.The product is well made, easy to clean and use. I highly recommend the Cynpel Peri Bottle to clean your tushy. It reduces the amount of toilet paper you use and you feel cleaner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for keeping clean & not chaffing esp. if you're on diuretics
reviews.reviewText: Bought this as diuretics send me to the bathroom numerous times during the day. I was starting to get irritated due to the frequent wiping. This makes such a difference - just a squirt & dab. Much fresher feeling. Consider this a "bidet in a bottle".The upturned spout makes it so easy to use. The several holes give it more of a sprinkler action instead of a forceful stream.The bottle is a nice size and easy to squeeze even with my old arthritic hands. This would be a great product for caregivers to use for their clients. Much gentler & fresher than using toilet paper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works great, just wish it was a bit bigger.
reviews.reviewText: This peri bottle has been a lifesaver during the postpartum period. The design, particularly the bent head, makes it significantly easier to use compared to the ones provided in the hospital. The angled nozzle ensures better control and precision, enhancing the overall user experience.The functionality is excellent – it works exactly as intended and provides the relief and cleansing required during the postpartum recovery phase. The material is durable, and I haven't encountered any leakage issues, adding to its reliability.My only minor wish is that the bottle were a bit bigger. While it gets the job done, I find myself running out of water faster than I'd like, which can be a bit inconvenient. A larger capacity would have made this peri bottle even more practical for extended use.In conclusion, if you're in need of a postpartum peri bottle, this one is a great choice. It's effective, user-friendly, and the bent head design sets it apart from others on the market. While a larger size would have been ideal, the overall performance and convenience make it a valuable addition to the postpartum recovery toolkit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great if can't hook up bidet to commode
reviews.reviewText: My elderly parents at their home had a bidet connected to the commode's cold water since no outlet for having warm water. My dad with dementia needed help when toileting, but quite the shock to use! When I got home, decided to try this for myself (also had no good way to hook up to electricity). I fill with very warm water and use to help clean after toilet paper. Easy to squeeze, holds enough water for a pretty good cleaning, doesn't leak when turned upside down until squeezed, and angle is great; I only wish my mom and caregivers had known about this while my dad was alive...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A lifesaver for postpartum recovery
reviews.reviewText: I don't have anything bad to say about these! What I love about them:- Set comes with 2, so you can keep one upstairs and one downstairs without having to run around your house trying to find where you left it, especially while you're still recovering- The angled sprayer is more comfortable, ergonomic and easy to use compared to the regular bottle my hospital gave me- Comes in a drawstring bag in case you need to travel or want to store them for a while- Cute colors! Not a necessity but it's still nice.
great quality , beautiful packaging, serve the purpose . I will recommend to anyone, great price

Also dieses Produkt ist wirklich toll und hilft im Wochenbett sehr . Es kommt genug Wasser raus und ist sehr praktisch. Würde es jeden empfehlen. Das gute ist es ist nicht überteuert und hat eine sehr gute Qualität!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I had a natural delivery and needed stitches. This was great at stopping going to bathroom sting and helping me feel clean without needing to wipe or touch the stitches. Folds down to fit in your bag when going out. Easy to use and clean.
fácil se usar y muy cómodo
